titleStmt.title: A discovery of fire and salt discovering many secret mysteries, as well philosophicall, as theologicall.
Traicté du feu et du sel. English
titleStmt.author: Vigenère, Blaise de, 1523-1596.
Stephens, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, and are to be sold by Andrew Crooke ...,
